title: Website Audit
description: Get clarity on what's working, what's not, and exactly what to fix first. A comprehensive audit with actionable recommendations.

hero.headline: Get Clarity on What to Fix First
hero.subheadline: Stop guessing what's wrong with your website and systems. Get a professional review with a clear action plan.

features.title: Comprehensive Website Audit
features.description: Full analysis of your current site's performance, SEO, mobile responsiveness, and user experience.

features.title: Systems Assessment
features.description: Review of your current tools, automation gaps, and workflow inefficiencies.

features.title: Prioritized Action Plan
features.description: Clear roadmap showing exactly what to fix first for maximum impact.

features.title: 1-Hour Strategy Call
features.description: Live call to discuss findings and answer all your questions.

process.title: Schedule Your Review
process.description: Book your audit and receive access to submit your information.

process.title: Deep Dive Analysis
process.description: I analyze your website and systems, looking for opportunities.

process.title: Receive Your Report & Call
process.description: Get your detailed report and join me for a strategy call.

faq.question: What if I don't have a website yet?
faq.answer: Perfect! We'll review your business needs and create a strategic plan for your online presence from scratch.

faq.question: Is this just a sales pitch?
faq.answer: No. You get real value whether you hire me or not. The report is yours to keep and implement yourself if you choose.

faq.question: What's included in the report?
faq.answer: 15-20 page detailed analysis covering website performance, SEO opportunities, automation possibilities, and a prioritized action plan.
